name: Loop Dungeon (James Macgill)
description:
Solo winner of the the DesignDen  game jam!

Some players have reported crashes or very low frame rates with the browser version - let me know your experience in the comments section.  A windows build is available below, will work on builds for additional platforms.

Instructions

[WASD] to move.

[Space] to end a loop early.

Can you reach the treasure room? (That's the end... for now, more levels to come post jam).

August 3rd Patch (fix 3):

  • Fixed bug where characters would become confused if you were holding down WSAD at the end of a loop.
  • Fixed restart level so that it clears loop data
  • Added missing level select screen.
